name: vulnerability-analysis-lambda
description: AWS Lambda function for vulnerability analysis using OpenAI API

scripts.build: rm -rf dist function.zip && esbuild lambda.js --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --platform=node --format=esm --external:aws-sdk --external:@aws-sdk/client-lambda --external:openai --external:dotenv && cp -R ../files dist/files && cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && npm install --omit=dev
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -rq ../function.zip .
